name: Durham Neighborhood Compass Data
description: Data repository for Durham Neighborhood Compass

scripts.lower-csv: for f in metric/*.csv; do sed -i -e 's/\(.*\)/\L\1/' $f ; done
scripts.sort-csv: for f in metric/*.csv; do sort -n -o $f $f ; done
scripts.clean-csv: export LC_NUMERIC=C && npm run lower-csv && npm run sort-csv

author: DataWorks NC
